hero.title: Prime Location Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 49 Gurugram
description: Sector 49 Gurugram is a well-developed and highly preferred residential locality located close to Sohna Road and Golf Course Extension Road. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 49 Gurugram choose this area because of its excellent connectivity to NH-48, SPR Road, HUDA City Centre, and major corporate hubs of Gurugram. The sector is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping malls, restaurants, and daily utility stores, making everyday life comfortable and convenient.

Independent houses in Sector 49 offer spacious layouts, privacy, and a peaceful residential atmosphere. The locality is ideal for families, working professionals, and long-term tenants who prefer independent living over high-rise apartments. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 49 Gurugram ensures a balanced lifestyle with strong infrastructure, green surroundings, and easy access to all major parts of the city.

faqs.question: Is Sector 49 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 49 is a well-developed and family-friendly area with excellent connectivity and social infrastructure.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 49?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available to suit different budgets.

faqs.question: Is Sector 49 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area has schools, hospitals, parks, and markets nearby, making it ideal for families.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 49?
faqs.answer: Both furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on landlord preferences.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 49 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values vary by plot size, condition, and location, offering mid-range to premium options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 49?
faqs.answer: Sector 49 offers excellent connectivity via Sohna Road, Golf Course Extension Road, and SPR.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 49?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families. This depends on individual owners.

faqs.question: Is Sector 49 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is considered a safe and well-established residential locality.
